name: Teddy Bear Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
The complete game is an easy to play and constantly updating game with more and more puzzles.

You can find the perfect puzzles you like in this game.

Why you should get the game:
- A lot of puzzles included, many more will come in the future
-You can play Jigsaw with your PHOTOS ( Must Buy to UNLOCK )
- Rotation mode included
- Many levels of difficulty: from 2x2 to 8x8
- Easy preview the solution, with the touch of a button
- Pause and resume a puzzle. Never lose the progress in a puzzle
